title: Kidney bean salad with feta and peppers
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin kidney beans', '1 red pepper, chopped', '150g chopped cabbage', '2 spring onions', '150g crumbled feta cheese', '5 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
